message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's a good deal for you in the first round, Bob!
I think we can be more equitable. Let's split the money 60/40, but this time I'll take the larger share.  It's a fair deal considering the inflation you'll face in the next round.
The deal needs to be better for me to accept it in Round 3. This offer recognizes the time pressure we both face.
